scripts.build: webpack --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations --env emitNonSourceFiles && webpack --env buildType=prod && rollup -c
scripts.build:i18n: webpack --config ./webpack.i18n.config.js --env buildType=dev && webpack --config ./webpack.i18n.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.i18n.config.js
scripts.build:themes: webpack --config ./webpack.themes.config.js --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.themes.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.themes.config.js
scripts.build:icons: webpack --config ./webpack.icons.config.js --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.icons.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.icons.config.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:i18n && npm run build:themes && npm run build:icons
scripts.test:postcss: postcss build/survey-core.css --silent  -u postcss-calc -u autoprefixer -u postcss-fail-on-warn -o default.postcss.css && rimraf default.postcss.css
